text: igeos-eun hananim-i geudaeege gyesihan boiji anhneun bog-eum-ui ilbu igeoneul nuga malialeul bohohal geos ingaleul gyeoljeonghagi wihae geudeul-i hwa sal-eul deonjyeoss-eul ttae geudaeneun geudeulgwa hamkke issji anihayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-i geugeos-e gwanhae nonjaeng-eul hal ttaedo geudaeneun geudeulgwa hamkke issji ani hayeossnola
